review: I have a Fire Tv box in our bedroom and this works just as well downstairs. I was at first disappointed that it had to be plugged in as I assumed that it would be powered through HDMI. But it's not an inconvenience and I'd rather it work 100% rather than not because of lack of power.The apps are up to date and work perfectly fine like Netflix, Hulu, prime video, and plex. I replaced an old Roku hd from about 4 years ago with this and it was worth it.
author: jubeikibigami

review: I am a tech dummy and I was able to download it all by myself. I love all the features and they work great. I had a few minutes of trouble figuring out how to "find" all the selections. and click on them I gave 4 firesticks as Xmas presents and everbody LOVED it!  I love  being able to stream movies so easily on my 4 year old flat screen.
